AssociateDRTLogBucket.name: AssociateDRTLogBucket
AssociateDRTLogBucket.description: Grants permission to authorize the DDoS Response team to access the specified Amazon S3 bucket containing your flow logs

AssociateDRTRole.name: AssociateDRTRole
AssociateDRTRole.description: Grants permission to authorize the DDoS Response team using the specified role, to access your AWS account to assist with DDoS attack mitigation during potential attacks

AssociateHealthCheck.name: AssociateHealthCheck
AssociateHealthCheck.description: Grants permission to add health-based detection to the Shield Advanced protection for a resource

AssociateProactiveEngagementDetails.name: AssociateProactiveEngagementDetails
AssociateProactiveEngagementDetails.description: Grants permission to initialize proactive engagement and set the list of contacts for the DDoS Response Team (DRT) to use

CreateProtection.name: CreateProtection
CreateProtection.description: Grants permission to activate DDoS protection service for a given resource ARN

CreateProtectionGroup.name: CreateProtectionGroup
CreateProtectionGroup.description: Grants permission to create a grouping of protected resources so they can be handled as a collective

DeleteProtection.name: DeleteProtection
DeleteProtection.description: Grants permission to delete an existing protection

DeleteProtectionGroup.name: DeleteProtectionGroup
DeleteProtectionGroup.description: Grants permission to remove the specified protection group

DescribeAttack.name: DescribeAttack
DescribeAttack.description: Grants permission to get attack details

DescribeAttackStatistics.name: DescribeAttackStatistics
DescribeAttackStatistics.description: Grants permission to describe information about the number and type of attacks AWS Shield has detected in the last year

DescribeDRTAccess.name: DescribeDRTAccess
DescribeDRTAccess.description: Grants permission to describe the current role and list of Amazon S3 log buckets used by the DDoS Response team to access your AWS account while assisting with attack mitigation

DescribeEmergencyContactSettings.name: DescribeEmergencyContactSettings
DescribeEmergencyContactSettings.description: Grants permission to list the email addresses that the DRT can use to contact you during a suspected attack

DescribeProtection.name: DescribeProtection
DescribeProtection.description: Grants permission to get protection details

DescribeProtectionGroup.name: DescribeProtectionGroup
DescribeProtectionGroup.description: Grants permission to describe the specification for the specified protection group

DescribeSubscription.name: DescribeSubscription
DescribeSubscription.description: Grants permission to get subscription details, such as start time

DisableApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse.name: DisableApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse
DisableApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse.description: Grants permission to disable application layer automatic response for Shield Advanced protection for a resource

DisableProactiveEngagement.name: DisableProactiveEngagement
DisableProactiveEngagement.description: Grants permission to remove authorization from the DDoS Response Team (DRT) to notify contacts about escalations

DisassociateDRTLogBucket.name: DisassociateDRTLogBucket
DisassociateDRTLogBucket.description: Grants permission to remove the DDoS Response team's access to the specified Amazon S3 bucket containing your flow logs

DisassociateDRTRole.name: DisassociateDRTRole
DisassociateDRTRole.description: Grants permission to remove the DDoS Response team's access to your AWS account

DisassociateHealthCheck.name: DisassociateHealthCheck
DisassociateHealthCheck.description: Grants permission to remove health-based detection from the Shield Advanced protection for a resource

EnableApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse.name: EnableApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse
EnableApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse.description: Grants permission to enable application layer automatic response for Shield Advanced protection for a resource

EnableProactiveEngagement.name: EnableProactiveEngagement
EnableProactiveEngagement.description: Grants permission to authorize the DDoS Response Team (DRT) to use email and phone to notify contacts about escalations

GetSubscriptionState.name: GetSubscriptionState
GetSubscriptionState.description: Grants permission to get subscription state

ListAttacks.name: ListAttacks
ListAttacks.description: Grants permission to list all existing attacks

ListProtectionGroups.name: ListProtectionGroups
ListProtectionGroups.description: Grants permission to retrieve the protection groups for the account

ListProtections.name: ListProtections
ListProtections.description: Grants permission to list all existing protections

ListResourcesInProtectionGroup.name: ListResourcesInProtectionGroup
ListResourcesInProtectionGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve the resources that are included in the protection group

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to get information about AWS tags for a specified Amazon Resource Name (ARN) in AWS Shield

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or updates tags for a resource in AWS Shield

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource in AWS Shield

UpdateApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse.name: UpdateApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse
UpdateApplicationLayerAutomaticResponse.description: Grants permission to update application layer automatic response for Shield Advanced protection for a resource

UpdateEmergencyContactSettings.name: UpdateEmergencyContactSettings
UpdateEmergencyContactSettings.description: Grants permission to update the details of the list of email addresses that the DRT can use to contact you during a suspected attack

UpdateProtectionGroup.name: UpdateProtectionGroup
UpdateProtectionGroup.description: Grants permission to update an existing protection group

UpdateSubscription.name: UpdateSubscription
UpdateSubscription.description: Grants permission to update the details of an existing subscription
